text: Nepali Congress, Madhesh Province The ruling Nepali Congress is the Pradesh Congress Committee. The current leader of the Nepali Congress parliamentary party in the state is Ram Saroj Yadav who is also the Minister of Physical Infrastructure of the state. ==Related pages== * Bimalendra Nidhi * Ram Saroj Yadav * Saraswati Chaudhary ==Reference== Category:Nepali Congress Category:Madhesh Province
title: Nepali Congress, Madhesh Province
